flutter_community/flutter-draggable-scro.description: A scrollbar that can be dragge for quickly navigation through a vertical list. Additional option is showing label next to scrollthumb with information about current item.

flutter_community/persist_theme/.description: A Flutter plugin for persisting and dynamically changing the theme.
flutter_community/persist_theme/.title: Persist theme

flutter-examples/flutter_gallery/.description: Flutter Gallery is a resource to help developers evaluate and use Flutter. It is a collection of Material Design & Cupertino widgets, behaviors, and vignettes implemented with Flutter. We often get asked how one can see Flutter in action, and this gallery demonstrates what Flutter provides and how it behaves in the wild..
flutter-examples/flutter_gallery/.title: Flutter Gallery

LanarsInc/direct-select-flutter/.description: DirectSelect is a selection widget with an ethereal, full-screen modal popup displaying the available choices when the widget is interact with.
LanarsInc/direct-select-flutter/.title: Direct Select
